## About
Ashley K.G. Johnson is the Program Administrator for Chromebook Data Science Plus (CBDS+) at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health.

She attended Loyola University Maryland and graduated with a BA in psychology. 

## Interests
* Planning memorable events
* Reading entertaining and informative books and literature
* Listening to music, TED Talks and podcasts

## Projects
* Facilitating the startup of the January 2019 cohort of CBDS+
* Creating first website using R
